title: El Gaucho
text: Amazing grilled meat. The empanadas are a bit costly, but very much worth it. Heavily recommended for those seeking a more formal style of dinner

title: X falafel
text: Best arab place in town. Affordable prices and tasty food. The Crispy kip broodje is especially recommended. Students get 10% discount

title: M Noodle Bar
text: Very good ramen and fast service. Very little but charming place. Be warned: this place does not have a lot of tables and it gets full quite quickly, so it is better to make a reservation

title: Pannenkoekenhuis de Schaapsbel
text: Good Dutch traditional pancakes for decent prices

title: Curry Time
text: Good Thai food. The prices are affordable and the staff is nice. I recommend getting the green curry or the phad thai

title: Ramen55
text: Authentic Japanese-ran restaurant with the best ramen in Leiden. Slightly more expensive than M Noodle Bar, but heavily recommended

title: GP__D deli pies & coffee Co.
text: Delicious Greek pastries. Good place to go for coffee and sweets

title: India Way
text: Average-quality Indian food for high prices

title: Waag
text: Good restaurant with a stunning interior design

title: Einstein
text: Bar with good ambience and a good view of the canal

title: Bocconi Pasta Italiana
text: Best Italian restaurant in Leiden. Very good pasta. Very little but charming place. Be warned: this place does not have a lot of tables and it gets full quite quickly, so it is better to make a reservation

title: Delphi
text: Greek restaurant with a charming interior, kind staff and a very friendly cat. Be warned: the rations are very generous, so do not go here alone if you with to survive

title: Home Toward Hand Pulled Lanzhou Noodles
text: Chinese noodle restaurant with good prices. The food is acceptable, but not the best in Leiden

title: Hudson
text: Good burger place with adequate prices

title: Woo Ping
text: Best Chinese restaurant in Leiden. The roasted duck is exquisite

title: Bistro Noroc by Jarko
text: Charming little restaurant with good food and very kind staff. Photo taken by Michelle Zheng, available on Google Maps

title: Mamie Gourmande
text: French bakery with exquisite pastries. It is the best bakery in Leiden by far. I especially recommend the croissants
